Level 12
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 12
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, July 18, 2001 - 03:51 am:

STAGE 12


From where you start,face right,and create a box. Than jump on that box that you have just created. Than facing left,create a box that is left/underneath of you,than stand on it. Than again create another left/underneath box. Create boxes of three columms,and three rows. Each columm haveing two box. If you are at the level,stand on the left most columm of the box,and wait for the psylora to be far away,than jump and take the golden coin. Than stand on the right columm,and wait for the psylora to be away,and jump and take the another golden coin. Create the columm two boxes mroe higher,meaning your columm have four boxes now,and three columms. Now stand on the left columm,and wait for the psylora to come,and once it comes,and move away,create a left/underneath box and move left two steps quickly,and again quickly create another left/underneath box to block the psylora's path. If you are not fast enough to do it,go back to where the columm was,and destroy the box,so that it will not block the psylora's path. If you block the psylora path,it will go of course,and bang into you,and kill you. If you have already block the psylora's path,create another box,and climb it up,and jump on that box,and get the golden key. Than go down and stand on the right columm,and trap the psylora's like the way which I taught you. And after that,stand on the most right box. Face left,and create a box,and jump on it. Still facing left,create another box,and the plant will stand on it. Destroy the box when the plant is standing on it,and the plant will fall to it's death. Than create boxes,and go through the door,AND YOU WIN STAGE 12.
